list-item.p: Current and projected future crop suitability maps for nineteen major crops in the Levant, Tigris-Euphrates and the Nile basins.
The data can be used to assess impact of climate change on crops in the MENA region.
The data can be used as input to machine learning algorithms.
The data can be compared or correlated with land use changes or results from other emission scenarios.
The data can be valuable for stakeholders, researchers, and governments for agriculture and water management and policy directives.
